Description: Fragment of a red, plain weave woollen cloth; Rather open crepe weave, very worn with rough repairs in a thick red wool thread, faded colour; Warp: S spun wool, c.12tpc; Weft: S spun wool, 12tpc; Edges: ragged or cut; Sewing: repairs in S spun Z ply red thread
Curator's comments: Unreg. 55; Found 1988? in packet in Keeper's Room, previous location cupbaord O; Probably from a tunic; Edges cut post excavation; Information from Hero granger-Taylor (2.4.1991)
